page.title: 18 Methil Library
page.content: Of the five libraries in the district, Methil Public is the largest.The library and the war memorial in the park opposite were built with money donated by local people.They are memorials to these who served in the 1914-18 war. Renovations completed in March 1985 made the inside larger,more open and comfortable with a welcoming atmosphere .Of the 40000 books romance and western stories are the most popular. There is a childrens section, a reading room where magazines and daily newspapers are and a cassette library.For the housebound a mobile library travels round taking books to peoples homes.Books in Braille,even stories on tape make it possible for the blind to enjoy the service.Only 30% of the population use the library although there is high unemployment.
